job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Products and Technology The Global Sales Intelligence team at Salesforce is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to develop tools, insights, and technologies to help our Global Enablement team achieve extraordinary value. We are looking for someone to join our team to work on groundbreaking R&D projects, to leverage massive structured, unstructured, transactional and real-time data sets from a variety of sources, to analyze usage and behavior patterns. We aim to provide actionable recommendations and insights to enable our sales teams to increase their productivity, remove obstacles and reduce their time spend on on-sales activities.  You will build ML systems and AI services in order to drive sales teams’ engagement, enablement program design, and make enablement activities measurable, actionable, relevant, and predictable. You will be responsible for translating business and functional requirements into concrete work with the design, development, testing, and deployment of highly scalable distributed services.  The ideal candidates will have a solid background in machine learning and software engineering, model development and testing, model explanations, data visualization, and production automation. They should exhibit technical acumen, product sense and business savvy, with a passion for making an impact through creative storytelling and timely actions.  If you are a machine learning engineer who is equally at home discussing a project with business owners, data scientists, researchers or developers, thrives on accelerating business growth, is willing to roll their sleeves up and do the hard work, and is extremely creative, collaborative, innovative – yet disciplined, methodical and down to earth – we want to hear from you.  Work with us as we develop and apply state-of-the-art AI techniques, where your work will directly impact the success of Sales operations across Salesforce.
